name: Schrodinger's Cat (jeroenpx)
description:
TIP: the Web version is a bit slow.... Better to download the game!

A game about a cat trying to escape from a space station.

Controls:
Move with ⌨️ WASD/arrow keys and Jump with Space/ctrl
Look around with 🖱️ the mouse
Fire Shrink Gun 🔫 with Left Click - (after picking it up)
Pick Up/Throw with Right Click

Escape - Pause + music volume can be changed

Small post-jam fixes:

  • Fixed small bug where mirrors didn't shrink
  • Fixed small bug where mirrors had a hole in them
  • Fixed small bug where gun pickup collider was left behind
  • End scene was replaced (but re-using assets & code made during the jam)
  • Tweaked camera when tiny

Made by a team of 4 people during Ludum Dare 49.
